    • Constructor Detail

      • Trip

        public Trip(GtfsTrip gtfsTrip,
    java.lang.String properRouteId,
    java.lang.String routeShortName,
    TitleFormatter titleFormatter)
        Constructs Trip object from GTFS data.
        Parameters:
        gtfsTrip - The GTFS data describing the trip
        properRouteId - The routeId, but can actually be the ID of the parent route.
        routeShortName - Needed to provide a route identifier that is consistent over schedule changes.
        titleFormatter - So can fix titles associated with trip

      • Trip

        public Trip(Trip tripFromStopTimes,
    int frequenciesBasedStartTime)
        Creates a copy of the Trip object but adjusts the startTime, endTime, and scheduledTimesMap according to the frequenciesBasedStartTime. This is used when the frequencies.txt file specifies exact_times for a trip.
        Parameters:
        tripFromStopTimes -
        frequenciesBasedStartTime -

    • Method Detail

      • addScheduleTime

        public void addScheduleTime(java.lang.String stopId,
                   ScheduleTime scheduleTime)
        For adding a ScheduleTime for a stop to Trip. Updates scheduledTimesMap, startTime, and endTime.
        Parameters:
        stopId -
        scheduleTime -

      • setTripPattern

        public void setTripPattern(TripPattern tripPattern)
        TripPattern is created after the Trip. Therefore it cannot be set in constructor and instead needs this set method.
        Parameters:
        tripPattern -

      • setTravelTimes

        public void setTravelTimes(TravelTimesForTrip travelTimes)
        TravelTimesForTrip created after the Trip. Therefore it cannot be set in constructor and instead needs this set method.
        Parameters:
        travelTimes -

                                            int configRev)
                                                     throws org.hibernate.HibernateException

      • toShortString

        public java.lang.String toShortString()
        Similar to toString() but doesn't include scheduledTimesMap which can be quite verbose since it often contains times for many stops.
        Returns:

        Required by Hibernate

      • getStartTime

        public java.lang.Integer getStartTime()
        Returns departure time of first stop of trip. Gtfs requires departure time of first stop of trip and arrival time of last stop of trip to be set, even for unscheduled blocks. That way they can determine running time of trip.
        Returns:
        departure time of first stop of trip. Time is seconds into the day.

      • getEndTime

        public java.lang.Integer getEndTime()
        Returns arrival time of last stop of trip. Gtfs requires departure time of first stop of trip and arrival time of last stop of trip to be set, even for unscheduled blocks. That way they can determine running time of trip.
        Returns:
        arrival time of last stop of trip. Time is seconds into the day.

        Returns:
        the configRev

      • getRoute

        public Route getRoute()
        Returns the Route object for this trip. This object is determined and cached when first accessed.
        Returns:

      • getRouteName

        public java.lang.String getRouteName()
        Returns route name. Gets it from the database configuration.

        public java.lang.String getServiceId()

      • getHeadsign

        public java.lang.String getHeadsign()
        The trip_headsign value from the trips.txt file. But it has been processed by the TitleFormatter to correct capitalization and such.
        Returns:
        the name

      • getBlockId

        public java.lang.String getBlockId()
        The block_id is an optional element in GTFS trips.txt file. If it is available it is used. But if it is not then the trip_id is used as next best thing.
        Returns:
        blockId

      • getBlock

        public Block getBlock()
        Returns the Block that the Trip is associated with. Only valid when running the core application where can use Core.getInstance(). Otherwise returns null.
        Returns:

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Returns the index of the trip in the block. Uses DbConfig from the core project to determine the Block. If not part of the core project the Block info is not available and -1 is returned.
        Returns:
        The index of the trip in the block or -1 if block info not available.

        Returns:
        the shapeId

        the getScheduleTimesMap

      • getScheduleTime

        public ScheduleTime getScheduleTime(java.lang.String stopId)
        Returns the ScheduleTime object for the stopId. Will return null if there are no schedule times associated with that stop for this trip. Useful for determining schedule adherence.
        Parameters:
        stopId -
        Returns:
